document.full_text: france urged syria on thursday to open up to dialogue and democratic change, after syrian forces killed six people in an attack on protesters and opened fire on hundreds of youths marching in solidarity.
document.title: france urges syria to embrace dialogue, change
lines_and_colors: france urged syria on thursday to open up to dialogue and democratic change, after syrian forces killed six people in an attack on protesters and opened fire on hundreds of youths marching in solidarity.
